an4.185:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate.
an4.185:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula abhinnata abhinnata paribbajaka sippinikatire paribbajakarame pativasanti, seyyathidam annabharo varadharo sakuludayi ca paribbajako anne ca abhinnata abhinnata paribbajaka.
an4.185:1.3: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena sippinikatire paribbajakaramo tenupasankami.
an4.185:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena tesam annatitthiyanam paribbajakanam sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantara katha udapadi:
an4.185:2.3: Atha kho bhagava yena te paribbajaka tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi. Nisajja kho bhagava te paribbajake etadavoca:
an4.185:3.1: “Kaya nuttha, paribbajaka, etarahi kathaya sannisinna, ka ca pana vo antarakatha vippakata”ti?
an4.185:3.2: “Idha, bho gotama, amhakam sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
an4.185:4.1: “Cattarimani, paribbajaka, brahmanasaccani maya sayam abhinna sacchikatva paveditani.
an4.185:4.5: Iti vadam brahmano saccam aha, no musa.
an4.185:4.6: So tena na samanoti mannati, na brahmanoti mannati, na seyyohamasmiti mannati, na sadisohamasmiti mannati, na hinohamasmiti mannati.
an4.185:4.7: Api ca yadeva tattha saccam tadabhinnaya pananamyeva anuddayaya anukampaya patipanno hoti.
an4.185:5.3: Iti vadam brahmano saccamaha, no musa.
an4.185:5.4: So tena na samanoti mannati, na brahmanoti mannati, na seyyohamasmiti mannati, na sadisohamasmiti mannati, na hinohamasmiti mannati.
an4.185:5.5: Api ca yadeva tattha saccam tadabhinnaya kamanamyeva nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
an4.185:6.2: ‘sabbe bhava anicca …pe… tadabhinnaya bhavanamyeva nibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya patipanno hoti.
an4.185:7.2: ‘naham kvacani kassaci kincanatasmim na ca mama kvacani katthaci kincanatatthi’ti.
an4.185:7.3: Iti vadam brahmano saccam aha, no musa.
an4.185:7.4: So tena na samanoti mannati, na brahmanoti mannati, na seyyohamasmiti mannati, na sadisohamasmiti mannati, na hinohamasmiti mannati.
an4.185:7.5: Api ca yadeva tattha saccam tadabhinnaya akincannamyeva patipadam patipanno hoti.
an4.185:7.6: Imani kho, paribbajaka, cattari brahmanasaccani maya sayam abhinna sacchikatva paveditani”ti.
